name: RIS_END_PROC_ANS
description: This table contains the answers collected for each order at End Exam.

columns.name: ORDER_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for answers given when ending a procedure associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: END_PROC_ANS_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for an answer given when ending a procedure.
